code:
import"antd/es/message/style";import _message from"antd/es/message";/*
能发送异步ajax请求的函数模块
函数返回promise对象
 */import axios from'axios';export default function ajax(url){var data=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};var type=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:'GET';return new Promise(function(resolve){var promise;if(type==='GET'){//发送GET请求
promise=axios.get(url,{params:data});}else{//发送POST请求
promise=axios.post(url,data);}promise.then(function(response){resolve(response.data);}).catch(function(error){_message.error('请求出错：'+error.message);});});}
